records.question: What is the return policy?
records.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase.

records.question: What payment methods are accepted?
records.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

records.question: How do I track my order?
records.answer: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email.

records.question: What is the warranty period?
records.answer: The warranty period is one year from the date of purchase.
